title: Why Venezuela’s Vast Oil Wealth Couldn't Prevent Its Collapse
summary: The dramatic events over the weekend in Venezuela have renewed global attention on a country that, on paper, should be one of the world’s great energy powers. Venezuela holds the largest proven oil reserves on Earth, yet its oil industry has been in long-term decline for two decades. Understanding …
